Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Asikuvulelanga1 isifuba sakho na (Muhammad)
Sakothulela umthwalo wakho
Obukusinda umqolo
Saza Saphakamisa ibakala lakho
Inene kubo bonke ubunzima kukho ukukhululeka
Kanti, inene kubo bonke ubunzima kukho ukukhululeka
Ngoko ke wakugqiba (imisebenzi yakho yosuku) zinikele kunqulo luka-Allâh
Yaye beka iingcinga zakho zonke eNkosini yakho
Ndifunga ngomkhiwane nangomnquma
Nangentaba yeSinayi
Nangesi sixeko sokhuseleko (saseMakkah)
Inene umntu Samdala ngesona simo silungileyo
Saphinda Samthobisela kowona mgangatho uphantsi
Ngaphandle	kwabo	bakholwayo	benze	imisebenzi yobulungisa. Okwabo iya kuba ngumvuzo ongeze usilele
Yintoni ke emva koku enibangela ukuba niyiphike inkolo
AyingoAllâh na Oyena Mgwebi Unobuluko kubagwebi
Funda! Egameni leNkosi yakho Eyadalayo
Yadala umntu ngehlwili legazi
Funda iNkosi yakho Inesisa
Yona Yafundisa ukubhala ngosiba
Yamfundisa umntu oko abengakwazi
Kodwa inene umntu uyagabadela
Kuba uzicingela ukuba akaxhomekekanga ntweni
Inene eNkosini yakho kulapho kuza kubuyelwa khona
Umbonile na lowo uthintela
Umkhonzi xa ethandaza
Ingaba umbona ekuso isiKhokelo kusini na
Okanye uyalela (abantu) ukuba bahlonele (uAllâh)
Umbonile na ukuba uphika inkolo, afulathele
Akazi na ukuba uAllâh Uyambona
Nakanye ukuba akayeki siya kumrhuqa ngenwele zebunzi lakhe
(Ezo) nwele zebunzi lexoki
Makabize koogxabakhe (bamncede) ke
Thina Siya kubiza abagcini siHogo. (Baqubisane naye)
Nakanye! Ungamthobeli lowo, wena, qubuda, uzisondeze (kuAllâh)
Inene esi siTyhilelo Sasityhila ngoBusuku baMandla
Yintoni na enokukucacisela okokuba buyintoni na uBusuku baMandla
UBusuku baMandla bungcono kuneenyanga eziliwaka
Ngabo kuhla iingelosi noMoya [oyiNgcwele (uJibrîl)] ngemvume ka-Allâh nemiyalelo yonke
(Ngobo busuku) kuba luxolo kude kube ngoms’obomvu
Abo bangakholwayo phakathi kwaBantu beNcwadi nabanquli-zithixo babengekhe bayeke (ukuba ngabahedeni) de kwafika ubungqina obucacileyo kubo
UMthunywa ovela kuAllâh ecengceleza iziBhalo eziNgcwele
Apho kuzo kukho iiNcwadi ezilungileyo nezithe Tye
Kananjalo aBantu beNcwadi babengezontlaba zahlukane de kwafika ubungqina obucacileyo
Ukanti babengayalelwanga nto yimbi ngaphandle kokukuba, banqule uAllâh, banyaniseke enkolweni yaKhe, banquleYena Yedwa, benze iSalâh (umthandazo), banikele ngeZakâh, oko ke yayiyeyona Nkolo ithe Tye
Inene abo bangakholwayo phakathi kwaBantu beNcwadi nabanquli-zithixo baya kuba seMlilweni wesiHogo, ngonaphakade, bazezona zidalwa zibi
Inene, ke bona abo bakholwayo, benza imisebenzi yobulungisa, bazezona zidalwa zilungileyo

Umvuzo wabo oseNkosini yabo yiEdeni (uMyezo iPaladesi), ekumpompoza amanzi phantsi kwayo. Baya kuhlala apho kuyo ngonaphakade, uAllâh Uya kukholiseka ngabo nabo bakholiseke nguYe. Oko kokwabo bayoyikayo iNkosi yabo
Xa umhlaba uNyikima ngokunyikima kwawo
Uze	utyekezele	ngaphandle	wonke	umthwalo	wawo (obungaphakathi kuwo)
Abantu baya kuthi: “kwenzeka ntoni na ngawo?”
Ngaloo Mini uya kuchaza iindaba zawo
Kuba iNkosi yakho Iya kuwutyhilela (okwenzekayo phezu kwawo)
Ngaloo Mini abantu baya kuza bengamaqela athe saa, beze kuboniswa izenzo zabo
Nabani	na	lowo	uthe	wenza	isenzo	esilungileyo esingangentlantsi, uya kusibona
Nalowo uthe wenza isenzo esingcolileyo esingangentlantsi, uya kusibona
Ndifunga ngamahashe agabadula, akhefuzele
Atakise iintlantsi zomlilo (ngamanqina awo)
Ephumelelisa uhlaselo lwawo kwasekuseni
Aqhumise uthuli luye kutsho emafini kusenjalo
Agqobhoze, aye phambili angene esazulwini (sotshaba)
Inene umntu (ongakholwayo) akanambulelo eNkosini yakhe (uAllâh)
Yaye inene ulingqina lako oko (ngezenzo zakhe)
Kwaye inene unobutyhuthu-tyhuthu ekuthandeni kwakhe ubutyebi
